summary: This document is an email from Lisa Kenney dated July 4, 2020, alleging connections between a group of Massachusetts real estate developers, nightclub owners, and rogue police officers with Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell. The author claims the group uses anonymized LLCs for real estate and financial fraud, and suggests they may be connected to the Granite Realty LLC that purchased the New Hampshire property where Maxwell was arrested. The document includes numerous allegations of corruption, threats, and personal harassment.

persons.name: Lisa Kenney
persons.context: Author of the email alleging corruption and connections between a Massachusetts group and Epstein/Maxwell. Claims to have been reporting on the group for over ten years and receiving threats.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referenced as a wealthy pedophile whose activities and connections are compared to those of William O'Connell.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Referenced as Epstein's accomplice. The document focuses on the New Hampshire property purchased by Granite Realty LLC where she was arrested.

persons.name: William O'Connell
persons.role: Wealthy real estate developer, accused pedophile
persons.context: Also referred to as Bill O'Connell or 'Billy O'. Described as a Massachusetts developer arrested for statutory rape and cocaine trafficking, with alleged similarities to Epstein. Claims he had a female accomplice named Phyllis Capuano.

persons.name: Phyllis Capuano
persons.context: Identified as the woman who allegedly brought underage girls to O'Connell, compared to Ghislaine Maxwell's role for Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey W. Roberts
persons.role: Listed manager/member of Granite Realty LLC
persons.context: Name listed on the certificate of formation for Granite Realty LLC. The author alleges this name is used as an alias by a police officer and is connected to eBay accounts and numerous shell companies.

persons.name: Richard Yospin
persons.role: Trustee, seller of property to Granite Realty LLC
persons.context: Trustee of The Richard Yospin Family Trust, who granted the New Hampshire property to Granite Realty LLC. The author suggests this may be an alias used by the group.

persons.name: Scott Borgerson
persons.context: Identified in the document as the homeowner behind Tidewood LLC, which purchased land in Manchester-by-the-Sea, Massachusetts, where Maxwell lived.

persons.name: Michael McParland
persons.context: Named as the sender of threatening emails to Lisa Kenney that included rape threats against her daughter.

persons.name: Trooper
persons.context: Referred to generically as 'Trooper' or 'Trooper I'. Allegedly the brother of nightclub owners, close to William O'Connell, and responsible for hacking, threats, and property destruction against Lisa Kenney.

persons.name: Dave Manning
persons.context: Named as the sender of a 2007 email to Lisa Kenney boasting about hacking her accounts and making copies of her keys.

persons.name: Kathleen Morrissey
persons.context: Mentioned as one of the attorneys involved with the group who uses aliases and signs fictitious names to legal documents.

persons.name: Senator Joyce
persons.context: Mentioned as a friend of the group who was allegedly laundering money through his firm and was arrested.

persons.name: Michael Morrissey
persons.context: Current Norfolk County DA who received donations from the O'Connell brothers. The author claims the nightclub owners and 'Trooper' are silent campaign managers for him.

persons.name: William Delahunt
persons.context: Former U.S. Representative who lives at Marina Bay and received donations from the O'Connell brothers.

persons.name: Tim Cahill
persons.context: Former state Treasurer who received donations from the O'Connell brothers.

persons.name: Joseph H. Steig
persons.role: Treasurer of MASS VENTURES MANAGEMENT, INC.
persons.context: Listed as Treasurer on corporate documents associated with Jeffrey W. Roberts. Has an associated eBay account.

persons.name: John G. Gallup
persons.role: Director of MASS VENTURES MANAGEMENT, INC.
persons.context: Listed as a Director on corporate documents associated with Jeffrey W. Roberts.

persons.name: Susan Teixeira
persons.role: Registered Agent for GRANITE REALTY CORP.
persons.context: Listed as the Registered Agent for GRANITE REALTY CORP. in Massachusetts corporate filings.

connections.description: Described as close; the trooper is allegedly the brother of nightclub owners who cater to O'Connell. The trooper allegedly recruits bad cops for money for O'Connell.
Capuano allegedly brought underage girls to O'Connell for sex in exchange for money and gifts, analogous to Maxwell's role for Epstein.
Described as accomplices in sex trafficking, with Maxwell bringing young girls to Epstein.
The author alleges similarities between their crimes and suggests they likely knew each other and may have had business dealings.
The New Hampshire property where Maxwell was arrested was purchased by Granite Realty LLC. The author alleges the group behind the LLC may have been hiding her.
The author alleges the name Jeffrey W. Roberts is an alias used by a police officer, and transactions on the associated eBay account involve passing money between him and MA police officers.
O'Connell is connected to the Kane nightclub owners, who are part of the alleged corrupt group. They are all from Quincy, MA.
The trooper is alleged to be the brother of the nightclub owners.
The trooper is alleged to have hacked, threatened, and vandalized Kenney's property over many years in retaliation for her reports.
Borgerson is identified as the homeowner behind Tidewood LLC, which purchased land in Massachusetts where Maxwell lived. They socialized together.

events.title: Purchase of New Hampshire property by Granite Realty LLC
events.description: A 150-acre estate in Bradford, New Hampshire, was purchased for $1,070,750 in an all-cash purchase through Granite Realty LLC (also spelled Granite Reality LLC).

events.title: Arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell was arrested at the New Hampshire estate purchased by Granite Realty LLC.

events.title: Alleged initial meeting between William O'Connell and 14-year-old victim
events.description: A 14-year-old girl first met William O'Connell, then around 70, through a 19-year-old named 'Kookie' (Phyllis Capuano).

events.title: Police search of William O'Connell's condo
events.description: State police searched O'Connell's Marina Bay condo, finding cocaine and leading to felony trafficking charges. Phyllis Capuano was also arrested.

events.title: Threatening emails to Lisa Kenney
events.description: Lisa Kenney received threatening emails from 'Michael McParland' containing rape threats against her daughter.

events.title: Threatening email from Dave Manning
events.description: Lisa Kenney received an email from 'Dave Manning' boasting about hacking her bank and email accounts and making copies of her house and truck keys.

events.title: Email submission by Lisa Kenney
events.description: Lisa Kenney sent the documented email to the NY Southern District US Attorney, alleging connections between the MA group and Epstein/Maxwell.

locations: Bradford, New Hampshire (location of Ghislaine Maxwell's arrest estate)
Quincy, Massachusetts (home of William O'Connell and the Kane family)
Marina Bay, Quincy, Massachusetts (location of O'Connell's condo)
Manchester-by-the-Sea, Massachusetts (location of Tidewood LLC property linked to Maxwell)
Avenue Foch, Paris, France (location of Epstein's apartment)
Woburn, Massachusetts (location of DGC accounting firm tied to TerraMar Project)
Springfield, Massachusetts (address tied to Jeffrey W. Roberts shells)
keyFacts: The author, Lisa Kenney, alleges a direct connection between a Massachusetts group (real estate developers, nightclub owners, and rogue police) and the Granite Realty LLC that purchased the New Hampshire property where Ghislaine Maxwell was arrested.

William O'Connell, a Massachusetts developer arrested for statutory rape and cocaine trafficking, is presented as a figure with striking similarities to Jeffrey Epstein, including the use of a female accomplice (Phyllis Capuano) to procure underage girls.

The document claims that the name 'Jeffrey W. Roberts,' listed as a manager of Granite Realty LLC, is an alias used by a Massachusetts police officer involved with the group, with associated eBay accounts used for financial transactions.
The author alleges a decade-long pattern of harassment, threats, and property destruction by members of the group, particularly a Massachusetts State Trooper, in retaliation for her reporting.

The document suggests the group uses a vast network of anonymized LLCs (with names like Granite Realty/Reality, Seaport, DBS) for real estate holdings and financial fraud, allegedly amounting to hundreds of millions of dollars.
